name: BAYER CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: Legislative and regulatory issues relating to agriculture, healthcare, tax and trade.
Medicare coverage and reimbursement issues related to Part B and D Drug Reimbursement.
Issues regarding Section 301 tariffs and their affect on supply chains.

H.R.1029 - Pesticide Registration Improvement Extension Act of 2017 (PRIA). Legislative provisions of H.R.2 - the Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018; Legislative issues relating to the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP).
S. 483 - Pesticide Registration Improvement Extension Act of 2019 (PRIA).
Issues regarding Section 301 tariffs and their effect on supply chains.
Legislative issues related to Bureau of Land Management response to the wildfire threat from invasive grass.
Legislative issues related to business taxation.
Legislative issues related to business taxation; legislative issues related to H.R.133 - Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2021.
Issues regarding the safety of certain herbicides.
Issues related to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission.
Legislative issues related to business taxation. Issues related to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act (TCJA) P.L. 115-97.
Issues regarding implementing the Corporate Transparency Act (CTA) (Public Law No: 116-283), including real estate provisions.
Medicare coverage and reimbursement issues related to Part B and D Drug Reimbursement. Advocacy related to the Farm Bill reauthorization.
Issues related to the FY25 National Defense Authorization Act (S. 4638/ H.R. 8070).
Legislative issues related to the appropriations process.
